headline: Fortinet price target lowered to $88 from $95 at Truist
summary: Truist lowered the firm’s price target on Fortinet (FTNT) to $88 from $95 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares as part of a broader research note previewing Q4 for Cybersecurity names. Companies in the firm’s coverage should report a strong calendar Q4 and take a conservative posture for guidance, so that model setups could drive a continued beat-and-raise cadence for 2026, the analyst tells investors in a research note. headline: Versa Named Global SD-WAN Leader by Frost & Sullivan
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., January 21, 2026--Versa, the global leader in unified security and networking, today announced that Frost & Sullivan, the technology consulting and research firm, has recognized Versa as the global SD-WAN industry leader in its latest annual report analyzing market trends and comparing the top vendors. In the new Frost RadarTM for SD-WAN Infrastructure 2025 report, Versa ranked highest on Frost & Sullivan’s Innovation Index and Growth Index among the nine SD-WAN companies ev
